CustomField.description: Send an Email warning the business that their funds will be revoked due to them no longer meeting the contract requirements
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Uncheck: means everything is good and the business is meeting the requirements on the contract. Check: means to send an email, warning the business that their funds will be revoked due to them no longer meeting the contract requirements. Will grant them 7 days to get back on track, else funds are revoked.
CustomField.label: Send Warning Email
